entry.title: $2450 // Perfect true 2 bedroom with windows all over the places.
entry.content:
Ref# 11713

Perfect true 2 bedroom with windows all over the place. Heat and hot water are included in the rent. The entire apartment is brand new. There's your own private washer/dryer in the apartment. HUGE kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and microwave included. Big backyard area for the building with picnic tables. 1 block away from a ton of cafe's, restaurants, bars and an awesome smoothie shop. The Utica AC runs express!

Washer dryer installed
